text:
Catalina's last known contact was:
c.varga@journalisttruth.org
cv.editor@riseup.net
Anna sent a cautious email to both:
Subject: Regarding the Prague painting
Ms. Varga,
A mutual contact passed me material you once held. I believe it connects to a Bitcoin trail and a possible laundering route. Please advise if you are safe and able to talk.
